title: Noun collection 5
sentences: I have a good idea for the class project.
There is a small problem with the hotel reservation.
We are looking for a solution for this mess right now.
I had a very strange dream last night.
You have to always tell the truth.
I don't like listening to any lies.
Look at this example to understand it better.
I have made a mistake in the math exercise.
You are completely right (have the reason); I got the street wrong.
We have a surprise for your birthday party.
I can't tell it; it's a secret.
The painting has a very beautiful detail in the corner.
What type of music do you prefer to listen to?
It is not the best way to talk to her.
It is a great opportunity to travel and learn.
My goal/objective is to learn Spanish this year.
I need your help with these very heavy suitcases.
Thanks for the advice; it is very useful for me.
, esta película es mejor que la otra.
In my opinion, this movie is better than the other one.
de mi jefe para salir antes.
I need my boss's permission to leave earlier.
I like the peace and the silence of the countryside.
en la biblioteca es muy importante.
Silence in the library is very important.
There is not much difference between these two phones.
This is the best part of the story.
de la compra para el supermercado.
I have made a shopping list for the supermarket.
dictionary:
La idea - The idea
El problema - The problem
La solución - The solution
El sueño - The dream
La verdad - The truth
La mentira - The lie
El ejemplo - The example
El error - The mistake / error
La razón - The reason
La sorpresa - The surprise
El secreto - The secret
El detalle - The detail
El tipo - The type / kind
La manera - The way / manner
La oportunidad - The opportunity
El objetivo - The goal / objective
La ayuda - The help
El consejo - The advice
La opinión - The opinion
El permiso - The permission
La paz - The peace
El silencio - The silence
La diferencia - The difference
La parte - The part
La lista - The list
